answerText: rhombuses [or rhombi][10] If a rhombus has diagonals of length x and y, then what is the area of the rhombus?
heading: ICCS |2014 | 8 | 7 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These shapes have area equal to side-length squared times sine of the angle between them.  [10] Identify these quadrilaterals that, like squares, have four equal sides and perpendicular diagonals. Unlike squares, however, their angles need not be right.
